revision.text:
{{refimprove|date=August 2016}} {{Use Australian English|date=January 2018}} {{Use dmy dates|date=January 2018}} This article is about the [[demographics|demographic]] features of the [[population]] of the [[Cocos (Keeling) Islands]], including [[population density]], [[Ethnic group|ethnicity]], education level, health of the populace, economic status, religious affiliations and other aspects of the population.
== CIA World Factbook demographic statistics == The following demographic statistics are from the [[CIA World Factbook]], unless otherwise indicated.<ref name="CIAPAPUANEWGUINEA">{{cite web|url= https://www.cia.gov/library/publications/the-world-factbook/geos/ck.html|title= Australia-Oceania :: COCOS (KEELING) ISLANDS|publisher= CIA The World Factbook}}</ref>
===Population=== *596
===Nationality=== *noun: Cocos Islander(s) *adjective: Cocos Islander
===Ethnic groups=== *[[Europeans]] *[[Cocos Malays]]
===Religions=== *[[Sunni Islam]] 80% *Other 20%
===Languages=== *[[Malay language|Malay]] (Cocos dialect) *[[English language|English]]
==See also== * [[Cocos (Keeling) Islands]] * [[Cocos Malays]] {{Oceania topic|Demographics of}}
==References== {{Reflist}}
